metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18457 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The function DCTStream::readScan in Stream.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftoppm.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication this affects poppler

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
